notes: Locales must be specified separately by prefixing the locale name with `Intl.~locale`, eg `Intl.~locale.en-GB`.
detectSource:
'Intl' in this &&
			Intl.Collator &&
			Intl.Collator.supportedLocalesOf &&
			Intl.Collator.supportedLocalesOf('ca-FR').length === 1 &&
			Intl.DateTimeFormat &&
			Intl.DateTimeFormat.supportedLocalesOf &&
			Intl.DateTimeFormat.supportedLocalesOf('ca-FR').length === 1 &&
			Intl.NumberFormat &&
			Intl.NumberFormat.supportedLocalesOf &&
			Intl.NumberFormat.supportedLocalesOf('ca-FR').length === 1
